name: King James Version Bible Database
description: Complete KJV Bible text in JSON format for local access

verses.genesis-1-1: In the beginning God created the heaven and the earth.
verses.genesis-1-2: And the earth was without form, and void; and darkness was upon the face of the deep. And the Spirit of God moved upon the face of the waters.
verses.genesis-1-3: And God said, Let there be light: and there was light.
verses.john-3-16: For God so loved the world, that he gave his only begotten Son, that whosoever believeth in him should not perish, but have everlasting life.
verses.john-3-17: For God sent not his Son into the world to condemn the world; but that the world through him might be saved.
verses.romans-8-28: And we know that all things work together for good to them that love God, to them who are the called according to his purpose.
verses.psalm-23-1: The LORD is my shepherd; I shall not want.
verses.psalm-23-2: He maketh me to lie down in green pastures: he leadeth me beside the still waters.
verses.psalm-23-3: He restoreth my soul: he leadeth me in the paths of righteousness for his name's sake.
verses.psalm-23-4: Yea, though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death, I will fear no evil: for thou art with me; thy rod and thy staff they comfort me.
verses.psalm-23-5: Thou preparest a table before me in the presence of mine enemies: thou anointest my head with oil; my cup runneth over.
verses.psalm-23-6: Surely goodness and mercy shall follow me all the days of my life: and I will dwell in the house of the LORD for ever.
verses.proverbs-3-5: Trust in the LORD with all thine heart; and lean not unto thine own understanding.
verses.proverbs-3-6: In all thy ways acknowledge him, and he shall direct thy paths.
verses.philippians-4-13: I can do all things through Christ which strengtheneth me.
verses.jeremiah-29-11: For I know the thoughts that I think toward you, saith the LORD, thoughts of peace, and not of evil, to give you an expected end.
verses.matthew-28-19: Go ye therefore, and teach all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Ghost:
verses.matthew-28-20: Teaching them to observe all things whatsoever I have commanded you: and, lo, I am with you always, even unto the end of the world. Amen.

metadata.notes: This is a sample subset. Full KJV database contains all 31,102 verses.
